item.text: Thank you for completing this questionnaire on being overweight! First, you will be asked a few questions about yourself. You will then be asked questions about your overweight. It will take you about 25 minutes to complete the questionnaire.

extension.valueMarkdown:
Thank you for
completing this questionnaire on being overweight! First, you will be asked a
few questions about yourself. You will then be asked questions about your
overweight. It will take you about 25 minutes to complete the questionnaire.
Questions about being overweight

item.text: How old were you when you became overweight, approximately?
Have you ever gained a lot of weight in a short period of time?

extension.valueMarkdown: Think for instance about specific medication, stress, living independently of pregnancy

item.text: What do you think caused the sudden weight gain?

extension.valueMarkdown: Think for instance about specific medication, stress, living independently of pregnancy

item.text: What do you think caused the weight gain?

extension.valueMarkdown: You may select more than one answer

item.text: What have you attempted so far to lose weight? You can check that below.

valueCoding.display: I got help from a dietician
I got help from a general practitioner or practice nurse
I got help from a physiotherapist
I got help from a psychologist
I got help from a lifestyle coach
I got help from someone else
I received medication for my weight

extension.valueMarkdown: You may select more than one answer

item.text: What other medications have you been given for your weight?
What other method have you tried?
The following questions are about you as a child.

extension.valueMarkdown: ##### The following questions are about you as a child.
0 till 11 years old

item.text: How was your weight as a child?

extension.valueMarkdown: 12 till 18 years old

item.text: How was your weight as an adolescent?
You will now be asked questions about your development as a child.

extension.valueMarkdown: ##### You will now be asked questions about your development as a child.

item.text: How quickly did you learn to walk as a child?
How quickly did you learn to talk as a child?
How well were you able to learn in school?

valueCoding.display: At the same time as other children

extension.valueMarkdown: For example, did you find yourself suddenly getting very angry? Or did you spend a lot of time doing things in a set way?

item.text: Did you have behavioural problems as a child?
**You will now be asked questions about your childhood family. By your family we mean your father, mother, brothers and sisters.**

extension.valueMarkdown:
**You will now be asked questions about your childhood family. By your family
we mean your father, mother, brothers and sisters.**
> Your family consists of:

item.text: How many brothers do you have?
How many sisters do you have?

extension.valueMarkdown: By family we mean father, mother and brothers and/or sisters

item.text: Were you the only one in your family with obesity as a child?
How many of your brothers were obese?
How many of your sisters were obese?
The following questions are about you as an adult, and about your habits in daily life.

extension.valueMarkdown: #### The following questions are about you as an adult, and about your habits in daily life.

item.text: Do you snore loudly? By loud, we mean someone being able to hear you snoring through a closed door.
Has anyone noticed you stop breathing while you were asleep?
Do you often feel tired during the day?

extension.valueMarkdown: If you don't know, enter 0.

item.text: Measure around your neck with a tape measure. How many centimeters is the circumference of your neck?
Do you ever have to work evenings or nights? (such as shift work)
How would you describe your appetite for food?

valueCoding.display: I have a lower appetite for food than others.
I have the same appetite for food as others.
I have a higher appetite for food than others.

item.text: When you eat a normal meal, do you feel full?
When you eat a normal meal, how soon are you hungry again after that?
How often do you get out of bed at night to eat?
Do you sometimes binge eat? i.e. do you sometimes eat very quickly and a lot at once?
How often do you do that?
How long have you been struggling with binge eating?
Do you feel like you can't do anything about your binge eating?
Do you feel bad about yourself after binge eating?

extension.valueMarkdown: Diet

item.text: What types of bread or rolls do you usually eat?

valueCoding.display: I don't eat bread or rolls
I eat whole grain, brown or multigrain bread or rolls
I eat white bread or rolls
I eat different types of bread or rolls

item.text: What types of pasta, rice, bulgur or couscous do you usually eat?

valueCoding.display: I don't eat pasta, rice, bulgur or couscous

extension.valueMarkdown: (this could also include vegetables you add to a sauce)

item.text: How many days a week do you eat vegetables?

extension.valueMarkdown: (1 piece of fruit is 1 apple, pear or bunch of grapes, 2 tangerines)

item.text: How many days a week do you eat at least 1 piece of fruit?

extension.valueMarkdown: Light soft drinks do not count.

item.text: How often do you drink fruit juice, fruit drinks, lemonade, soft drinks or energy drinks?

extension.valueMarkdown: How often do you drink fruit juice, fruit drinks, lemonade, soft drinks or energy drinks?

item.text: How many days per week do you eat potato chips, saltines or cheese cubes?

extension.valueMarkdown: Examples include: bapao sandwich, sausage roll, spring roll

item.text: How often do you eat savoury or fried snacks?

extension.valueMarkdown: A serving is 1 large cookie, 1 slice of cake, 4 small cookies or 4 chocolate squares

item.text: How many days per week do you eat a serving of cookies, chocolate, bonbons, cake or pie?

extension.valueMarkdown: By exercise, we mean doing sport. But also walking at a brisk pace.

item.text: How many minutes do you exercise per week?

extension.valueMarkdown: For example, doing strength training.

item.text: How many times per week do you exercise your muscles and bones?

extension.valueMarkdown: This could be due to a muscle disease, being in a wheelchair, or experiencing/having experienced pain.

valueCoding.display: No, I do not experience difficulty moving
Yes, I am now less able to move
Yes, I was less able to move in the past
Yes, I was less able to move in the past and  still am now

item.text: How often did you drink alcohol in the past year?

valueCoding.display: Less than once per month or once per month

item.text: How many glasses of alcohol did you drink on a normal day in the past year?
In the past year, how often did you drink 6 or more glasses of alcohol in one day?

valueCoding.display: Every day or almost every day

extension.valueMarkdown: Please fill in the year you quit

item.text: How often do you use drugs?

valueCoding.display: 1 time per month or more often

item.text: In what year were you born?

extension.valueString: Vul een geldige lengte in (in meters)

extension.valueMarkdown:
Please fill in meters.

Please use a period ., a comma , is not recognized
In kilogram
Only the numbers are sufficient, for example 1234

item.text: What is the highest level of education you have completed?

valueCoding.display: I did not complete any education

item.text: Who is completing this questionnaire for you?
Why is somebody else completing this questionnaire for you?

valueCoding.display: I don’t have very good vision
I have reading and writing difficulties

item.text: **You will now be asked questions about your health. And whether you have any special characteristics. These can sometimes be related to certain causes of obesity**

extension.valueMarkdown:
**You will now be asked questions about your health.
And whether you have any special characteristics. These can sometimes be
related to certain causes of obesity**

item.text: Does your doctor say you have a problem with your retina?
Do you have webbed fingers or toes? Or did you have in the past?
Do you have an extra toe or finger? Or did you have in the past?
Do you have high blood pressure?
Have you ever used or are you currently using medication for an underactive thyroid?

valueCoding.display: Yes, I am currently using them
Yes, I have used them in the past

item.text: Have you ever had any of the following problems with your head?
Did you lose consciousness as a result?
Did you answer 'yes' at least once? Then also complete these questions:

extension.valueMarkdown: ###### Did you answer 'yes' at least once? Then also complete these questions:

item.text: Have you developed extra cravings for food since then?
Since then, are you less likely to feel full after a meal?
Have you put on a lot of weight since then?
Do you experience noticeable hair loss?
Do you suffer from extremely dry skin?
Do you get cold very easily?

extension.valueMarkdown: These are also known as stretch marks.

item.text: Do you have purple or red streaks on your skin?

extension.valueMarkdown: Because of this, getting up from a chair is harder

item.text: Do you have insufficient muscle strength?
Are your arms and legs getting thinner?
Do you suffer a lot from pimples?
Are you experiencing a reduced libido?
Do you have any erectile problems?
Do you have a weaker erection in the morning?
Do you have persistent bothersome pain?
Do you have any joint pain? Like your hip, knee, shoulder or elbow?

extension.valueMarkdown: For example, while walking, climbing stairs or getting up from a chair?

item.text: Do you have pain in your knee or hip while moving?
Do you feel morning stiffness in your knee or hip?
How long does that affect you?

The next question is about menopause. Menopause can occur naturally. Or you may be postmenopausal due to medical reasons, such as ovaries that have been removed. 
Which applies to you?

valueCoding.display: I already went through menopause (either natural or due to medical reasons)

item.text: What form of birth control are you using?
Do you have a regular period?
Have you ever been diagnosed with PCOS (polycystic ovarian syndrome)?
Do you have a lot of hair growing on your face, chest, back or belly? Or do you regularly undergo hair removal treatments in these areas?
Do you often feel very frightened?
What do you think causes you stress?
Have you experienced anything bad in the past? For example, have you been assaulted or abused?
Are you currently having behavioural problems?
The following 2 questions relate to your work capacity. By 'work capacity' we mean the extent to which you are able to work both physically and mentally (psychologically).

extension.valueMarkdown: #### The following 2 questions relate to your work capacity. By 'work capacity' we mean the extent to which you are able to work both physically and mentally (psychologically).
Where 0 = I cannot work and 10 = I am very good at working

item.text: How well are you currently managing to work?

extension.valueMarkdown: Where 0 = Very little work and 10 = Very much work

item.text: How much work do you manage to get done on a typical workday?
Do you find your life meaningful?

extension.valueMarkdown: On a scale of 1 to 10, where 1 = very little support, 10 = very much support

item.text: How much support do you feel from people around you?

extension.valueMarkdown: On a scale of 1 to 10. 1 = the worst life you can imagine, 10 the best life you can imagine

item.text: What grade would you give your life?

extension.valueMarkdown: Please note! This does not apply if you use a medicine occasionally (such as a few days a year)

item.text: Have you used medication in the past OR are you currently using medication?

valueCoding.display: No, I have never used any medication
Yes, I am currently taking medication
Yes, I have used medication in the past

extension.valueMarkdown: You can check multiple answers

valueCoding.display: Valproic acid (Depakote OR Sodium valproate OR Orphiril OR Valproic acid suppositories FNA)
I am taking another medication for epilepsy

item.text: Do you use any of the following products?

valueCoding.display: I am using a different painkiller for nerve pain and an antacid.

item.text: What other medication are you taking?
How long have you been taking Gabapentin (Gabapentin OR Neurontin)?
How long have you been taking Pregabalin (Lyrica OR Pregabalin)?
How long have you been using Amitriptyline?
How long have you been using the other painkiller?

extension.valueMarkdown:
If you are not sure if you are taking corticosteroids, you can type the drug into google. It will usually say at the top of the page if it is a corticosteroid (= adrenal cortex hormone).

Examples include:

- Puffers/lung inhalants, such as Fluticasone, Beclometasone, Budesonide or Ciclesonide
- Injections (for example, for the joint or scar), such as Betamethasone, Triamcinolone, Dexamethasone, Hydrocortisone, Methylprednisolone or Prednisolone
- Tablets, such as Prednisolone, Dexamethasone, Prednisone, Cortisone Fludrocortisone or Hydrocortisone
- Infusion, such as Prednisolone, Dexamethasone, Betamethasone, Hydrocortisone, Methylprednisolone or Triamcinolone
- Nasal spray, such as Fluticasone, Beclomethasone, Budesonide, Mometasone or Triamcinolone
- Cream, such as Triamcinolone, Hydrocortisone, Betamethasone, Clobetasol, Clobetasone, Desoximetasone, Flumetasone, Fluticasone or Mometasone

valueCoding.display: Yes, I am currently using corticosteroids
Yes, I have used corticosteroids in the past three months
Yes, I have used corticosteroids in the past

item.text: Which corticosteroids are you currently using?
Which corticosteroids have you used in the past 3 months?
Which corticosteroids have you used in the past?

extension.valueMarkdown: Denk hierbij ook aan anticonceptie of vitamine supplementen

And can you also note the following:

- Dosage
- How often you use it
- When you started using it
- If stopped, when you stopped using it

Would you like help with anything? Then you can write that down here:

extension.valueMarkdown: If you agree to the storage of your data, we will ask you for your e-mail address. This will only be used to retrieve your information later if you decide you no longer want your information stored.

item.text: Do you agree to the storage of your data? Your data may then be used for scientific research in the future. More information about data storage can be found here: Information storage data Information storage data for incapacitated adults

extension.valueMarkdown:
Do you agree to the storage of your data? Your data may then be used for scientific research in the future. More information about data storage can be found here:

Storing information data

Storing information given to incapacitated adults

item.text: To the results + feedback on the questionnaire

extension.valueMarkdown: Naar de uitslag + feedback op de vragenlijst

item.text: Feedback on the questionnaire will be highly appreciated. In case you would like to provide us with feedback, you can contact us via email: COO@erasmusmc.nl Thankyou!

extension.valueMarkdown:
Feedback on the questionnaire will be highly appreciated. In case you would like to provide us with feedback, you can contact us via email: [COO@erasmusmc.nl](mailto:COO@erasmusmc.nl)

Thankyou!

item.text: You can click on 'Go to the results' at the bottom of this page. You will then see a summary of the questionnaire you filled in. On the next page you can use the 'Export PDF' button to save the questionnaire yourself. Please note! It may take a while for the summary to load. Do not click away from the page!

extension.valueMarkdown:
You can click on '**Go to the results**' at the bottom of this page. You will then see a summary of the questionnaire you have completed. On the next page you can use the 'Export PDF' button to save the questionnaire yourself.

**Please note!** It may take a while for the summary to load. Do not click away from the page!
Hormonale oorzaken
Hypothyreoïdie (= te traag werkende schildklier)

extension.valueString: ( answerScore('Faeces') + answerScore('Excessivehairloss') + answerScore('Dryskin') + answerScore('Cold') + answerScore('Sleep_tired') >= 4 ) or answerScore('Hypo_thyroid') = 1

extension.valueMarkdown: Hypogonadisme (= te weinig mannelijk geslachtshormoon bij mannen)

item.text: Hypogonadism (= too little male sex hormone in men)

extension.valueMarkdown:
Polycysteus ovariumsyndroom (PCOS)/hyperandrogenisme (= te veel mannelijk   
    geslachtshormoon bij vrouwen)

item.text: Polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS)/hyperandrogenism (= too much male sex hormone in women)

extension.valueMarkdown: Ziekte van Cushing (= te veel productie van stresshormoon cortisol)

item.text: Cushing's syndrome or disease (= excessive presence of the stress hormone cortisol)

extension.valueMarkdown: HYPOTHALAAM

extension.valueString: answerScore('Head_injury') >= 1  and (answer('Head_injury_appetite') = '1' or answer('Head_injury_lesssatiety') = '1' or answer('Head_injury_weightgain') = '1')

item.text: You have a serious head injury
Since the head injury you have had an increased appetite
Since the head injury you have had a reduced feeling of satiety
Since the head injury you have gained weight

extension.valueMarkdown: Syndromale obesitas

extension.valueString: answer('sp_monogen_box1') = true or answer('sp_monogen_box2') = true or answer('sp_syndr_box3') = true

extension.valueMarkdown: Calcgenetisch

Op basis van de antwoorden zou er sprake kunnen zijn van syndromale obesitas. Deze vorm van obesitas wordt veroorzaakt door een chromosoomafwijking, met obesitas als mogelijk gevolg. Dit is een zeldzame vorm van obesitas.

Bij een verdenking op een syndromale obesitas kan overwogen worden patiënt door te verwijzen  naar een in obesitas gespecialiseerde internist met de vraagstelling of het zinvol is hier aanvullend/genetisch onderzoek naar in te zetten.

De volgende kenmerken passen bij syndromale obesitas:

extension.valueString:
answer('Family_obesity') = '1' or ( answer('Family_obesity') = '0' and (
( answer('Family_obesity_father') ).toInteger() +
( answer('Family_obesity_mother') ).toInteger() +
( answer('Family_obesity_brother') ).toInteger() +
( answer('Family_obesity_sister') ).toInteger() = 1 )
)

item.text: There is a noticeable difference from your family members (for example, you are the only one with obesity)
You have difficulty reading and/or writing
You have/had fused fingers and/or toes or you have/had an extra finger and/or toe
You have or had developmental or behavioral problems (such as autism)
You had a very early or very late onset of puberty

extension.valueMarkdown: MEDICAMENTEUS

Uit de vragenlijst blijkt dat sprake is geweest van plotselinge gewichtstoename. Verder blijkt uit de vragenlijst dat patiënt één of meerdere medicijnen gebruikt die een gewichtsverhogende bijwerking kunnen hebben. Het gaat om het middel XXX. Op basis hiervan is het zinvol dit verder te onderzoeken en te overwegen of de betreffende medicatie kan worden afgebouwd dan wel omgezet kan worden in medicatie met een gewichtsneutrale bijwerking

extension.valueMarkdown: PSYCHISCH

Op basis van uw antwoorden kan het zinvol zijn om met uw (huis)arts te bespreken of u baat heeft bij verder onderzoek naar mentale en psychosociale factoren die een rol spelen bij het ontstaan van obesitas. Deze kunnen bijvoorbeeld het hongergevoel beïnvloeden. Of zorgen voor eetbuien. Dit zijn kenmerken die u in de vragenlijst heeft aangegeven:

item.text: Mental and psychosocial factors that may play a role in obesity
You indicate that you suffer from stress. You think that the cause(s) of this are:
You have experienced a stressful event
You have had a traumatic experience
You have binge eating that could possibly be associated with binge eating disorder
You indicate that you have depressive complaints
You indicate that you have been suffering from annoying pain for a long time
You indicate that you feel lonely
You indicate that you do not find life meaningful
You indicate that you feel (too) little support from people around you
You rate life as mediocre or bad
You have not completed any education or primary school/home economics school/pre-vocational secondary education/technical college
You have difficulty reading and/or writing
You indicate that you have financial problems

extension.valueMarkdown: LEEFSTIJL GERELATEERD

Een ongezonde leefstijl kan een rol spelen bij het ontstaan van obesitas. Ook kunnen leefstijlfactoren de kans op bepaalde ziektes verhogen. De volgende factoren die een negatief effect kunnen hebben op uw gezondheid komen bij u uit de vragenlijst:

( answer('Alcohol') = '4' or answer('Alcohol') = '5' ) and (answer('Alcohol_amount') = '2' or answer('Alcohol_amount') = '3' or answer('Alcohol_amount') = '4' or answer('Alcohol_amount') = '5' )

More information about reducing alcohol consumption can be found at: www.allesoverdrinken.nl
